vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PrivateDeposit.cashOut (patch_8.sol#32-39):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (patch_8.sol#34-37)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (patch_8.sol#35)
